reviewText: EYE OPENER OF A STORY. A REALITY CHECK.

My son loved this movie so much, he had his friends watch it and is even following Michael Kidd gilchrist's career.
If you're a high school basketball fan you need to watch this film. It was one of the best sports documentary's that I've seen. I highly recommend it!
If like basketball you will love this documentary.  I watched this on HBO and found it very interesting.  It shows the dedication and sacrifices made by the coaches and players.
